INSTANCE_ZONE.description: Compute Engine zone where you run your minecraft server.

INSTANCE_NAME.description: Instance name running your minecraft server on Compute Engine.

SHUTTER_AUTHORIZED_EMAIL.description: Email of service account which calls /shutter endpoint periodically. Typically, this service account is specified on Cloud Scheduler

FIREBASE_CREDENTIALS_JSON.description: JSON of firebase service account which is used to access Firebase Authentication and Firestore.

FIREBASE_CONFIG_JSON.description: Firebase configuration as a JSON format.

SHUTTER_COUNT_TO_SHUTDOWN.description: If /shutter counts a streak of this number that your Minecraft server is not connected, the server would be shutted down.
